title: When you agree to swap with the autofilled support, but they still feed

replies.body:
Even worse is when you swap, don't do good in the role you sacrificed yourself to go to and they flame you.
DJ Khaled, suffering from benevolence.
Oh yeah I know that one all too well. I agree to go support even though I queued top, I do poorly as support, and they flame me for not being a good support lol
But then you remember that its not your main role so you only lose 3 lp
the only thing i will miss about position ranks...

Ah yes, one of the good things about positional rank is also one of the bad things about positional rank.

For some, it's less stress about your performance because you're not playing you're main role/rank. But for everyone else, it's less motivation to actually try & not just troll.
The Catfish of Chuckles has struck again.
I've got more alternate names coming up for you as well, because making a meme of the meme lord is ultimate memery.
It's meme-ceptions. The deepest level of memehood
I suppose I should come up with a few names myself, Voluptuous She-Devil

I actually find it more annoying when I am autofilled and the person playing my main is really terrible.  If I swap with an autofill and they're bad after the swap, then it's a pretty safe bet the game was gonna be bad no matter what.  But if I'm in autofill and they have my role there's the alluring CHANCE that it could've been better if they weren't sucking at my main role.
As i always say: **NEVER! GIVE UP! YOUR POSITION!**
